thread.title: Charles Barkley Is Openly Rooting Against UCLA Because He Hates LaVar Ball
thread.title_full: Charles Barkley Is Openly Rooting Against UCLA Because He Hates LaVar Ball

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Charles Barkley Is Openly Rooting Against UCLA Because He Hates LaVar Ball
text:
The best story line of the NCAA Tournament thus far has been the feud brewing between UCLA star Lonzo Ball’s father, Lavar, and TNT analyst Charles Barkley. 
Earlier in the week Barkley challenged the elder Ball to a game of one and one after Ball said he could beat Michael Jordan heads up. 
Now Barkley is taking some time to troll LaVar Ball on national television by rooting against his son’s team UCLA throughout the tournament. 
Charles Barkley is Openly Rooting for UCLA and LaVar Ball to Lose pic.twitter.com/FVMYnd9ely 
— SportsCast (@SportsCast_THN) March 18, 2017 

This is great.
